Title: Requires the chief administrator of the courts and the office of information technology services to develop a portal for the exchange of discovery in criminal cases
Summary: Requires the chief administrator of the courts and the office of information technology services to develop a portal for the exchange of discovery in criminal cases.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to requiring the chief administrator of the courts, in conjunction with the office of information technology services, to develop a portal for the exchange of discovery in criminal cases
